description:
Brock Takes Things One Step Further ...
The next night Cameron comes back by with a buddy of his and after a few beers I ask Brock if he'd consider doing a double jack-off with Cameron as long as there was no touching. Brock said 'sure, why not?' It didn't take much convincing to get Cameron interested in checking out this new guys wares. Cameron was almost territorial in his decision to team up with Brock in a way that made it seem like he wanted to see what this stranger was packing other than a great body. Once they are comfortable and jacking off together I get curious and try to push the envelope a little further by asking Brock if it'd be OK if they came on each others chest rather than just a regular cumshot. Again, without hesitation, Brock agreed. Just watching Brock and Cameron laying next to each other -- one with his huge, defined manly body and Cameron with his boyish looks and fat cock made for a picture that I could go take a rest to many nights on end (but not without a little personal attention) before drifting off into a sweet dream about other possibilities.
title: Brock & Cameron
